Harua

Group (2022-present):

Introduction

Harua is a Japanese singer, dancer and actor under HYBE Labels Japan. He is best known as one of the vocalists and visuals of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.

In 2022, He participated in the survival show "&AUDITION - The Howling -"where he qualified to become a member of the boy group &TEAM.
